tool_description: ibnu_api is a RESTful API that provides access to various services related to text, images, and other data processing. The API is designed to facilitate developers in integrating diverse functionalities into their applications easily and efficiently.
name: ibnu_api
title: ibnu_api

api_list.name: searcLyrics
translate
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to translate text from one language to another using a translation service. Users can send a GET request with parameters including the source language code (iso-langcode) and the text to be translated (text). The translated result will be returned in the appropriate format.

api_list.name: tiktokDownloader
api_list.description: This endpoint serves as a TikTok downloader, allowing users to download TikTok videos by providing the video URL. Users can send a GET request with the URL of the TikTok video as a parameter (url). The endpoint will process the request and provide the downloadable video content.

api_list.name: chat
api_list.description: generate image with ai from open-ai dall-e

api_list.name: check
api_list.description: check status generate image from midjourney
